title: Lisa the Vegetarian
summary: "Lisa the Vegetarian" is the fifth episode in the seventh season of the American animated television series The Simpsons.[3] It originally aired on the Fox network in the United States on October 15, 1995.[1] In the episode, Lisa decides to stop eating meat after bonding with a lamb at a petting zoo. Her schoolmates and family members ridicule her for her beliefs, but with the help of Apu as well as Paul and Linda McCartney, she commits to vegetarianism.
